nycTheatreExcerpt: By the time the final curtain on "Mary Jane" drops, the audience is fully immersed in the titular character's experiences. McAdams masters her portrayal of a determined caregiver continually sitting in the uncertainty of worry, despite constantly leaning toward positivity.
